Name: Emod "Scorched" Stabilizer1
Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Energy Stabilizer
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 1

Recoil Stability: +40%
Recoil Kick: +40%
Spread: -10%
Projectile Speed: -12.5%

Reduce energy weapon recoil with the Emod Stabilizer1. ArmaMod designed the attachment to improve both horizontal and vertical recoil to ensure a more precise shot. The Scorched edition features a unique flame patina.
